overview: International Film Idol Silvia Saint stars as the beautiful Princess Juliet in this tragic Love Story in which she and her valient Prince are held captive under a spell cast by a scornful witch. The Witch's jelousy bolls over seeing every girl in the countryside having Anal Sex. Taking Double Penetrations and receiving Facials with Joy. Will the Young Princess and her princes love be strong enough to undo this horrible fate or will they be bound together forever in misery?
title: Silvia's Spell: Part 1
